snippet: Various flaws mar many of the party’s candidates, despite a year when the Republicans have chosen a contentious presidential candidate....
abstract: Opportunity presented for Democrats to take control of Senate because of way in which Donald Trump's candidacy will affect down-ballot races is made complicated by weak Democratic Senate candidates; weak bench is due primarily to depletion of their ranks in state legislatures and governors' mansions across country, as well as relative lack of institutional support for grass-roots-level candidates who represent changing base.
lead_paragraph: Various flaws mar many of the party’s candidates, despite a year when the Republicans have chosen a contentious presidential candidate.

headline.main: Democrats’ Weak Bench Undermines Hope of Taking Back Senate
headline.print_headline: A Weak Bench  Is an Obstacle for Democrats
